subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* In Japanese [[kyūjitai]] and Korean [[hanja]], this character is written with the left component <big>{{l|mul|𩙿}}</big> which is also the historical form found in the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}.
* In [[traditional Chinese]] and Vietnamese [[Nôm]], the left component is written <big>{{l|mul|飠}}</big> instead.

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[余]]}} ''(Japanese [[shinjitai]] and [[simplified Chinese]])'' - <small>Note that</small> {{l|mul|余}} and {{lang|mul|餘}} <small>are unrelated in [[traditional Chinese]]</small>
* {{l|mul|[[馀]]}} ''(Non-standard form in mainland China. Only used when it is desirable to distinguish {{lang|mul|餘}} from {{l|mul|余}})
